title: Bug 24194[About] Choosing link changes focus
OB: Close the apache window.Notice that when you come back to the dialog, the selection is changed.It'sput on the eclipse.org link.
SR: Open the Product dialog.2. Select some text in the second paragraph.3. Click on the apache link.4. Close the apache window.Notice that when you come back to the dialog, the selection is changed.It'sput on the eclipse.org link.
